response:
Namaste! I'm ई-BADAPATRA, your friendly government services assistant!

I'm here to help you with:
• Citizenship & National ID services
• Passport & Visa information
• Certificates (Birth, Death, Marriage)
• Business & Land services
• Trekking permits
• Labor services
• Office hours & locations

What can I help you with today? Try asking "what day is today?" or about any government service!

धन्यवाद for using ई-BADAPATRA! 

I hope I could help you today. Remember:
• Government offices are here to serve you
• Keep your documents safe and updated
• Visit during office hours for best service

Have a wonderful day, and come back anytime you need help with government services! 

Jai Nepal!

Government Services Available:

Popular Services:
• Citizenship Certificate
• National ID Card
• Passport Services
• Birth/Death/Marriage Certificates
• Land Registration
• Business Licenses
• Trekking Permits
• Vehicle Registration

How to get specific information:
Just ask me about any service like:
• "How to get citizenship certificate?"
• "Passport documents required"
• "Birth certificate fee"

What specific service would you like to know about?

Government Office Locations:

Major offices handling citizen services:

District Administration Office (DAO)
• Citizenship certificates
• National ID cards
• Various administrative services

Ward Offices
• Birth/Death/Marriage registration
• Local recommendations

Department of Passport
• Passport services
• Travel documents

Specific Location Info:
Please specify which service or office you need, and I'll provide detailed location information!

Government Ministries & Departments:

Key Ministries for Citizen Services:
• Ministry of Home Affairs (Citizenship, Immigration)
• Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Passport, Diplomatic services)
• Ministry of Land Management (Land services)
• Ministry of Labour & Employment (Labor services)
• Ministry of Culture, Tourism & Civil Aviation (Trekking permits)

Contact Information:
Please specify which ministry or service you need contact details for, and I'll provide the relevant phone numbers and addresses!

I'm ई-BADAPATRA - Your Government Services Assistant!

What I Can Help You With:

Document Services:
• Citizenship Certificates & National ID
• Passport & Visa Services
• Birth, Death, Marriage Certificates

Business & Property:
• Business Licenses & Factory Registration
• Land Registration & Transfer
• Vehicle Registration & Driving Licenses

Special Services:
• Trekking Permits for Restricted Areas
• Labor & Employment Services
• Office Hours & Location Information

How to Use:
Just ask naturally! Examples:
• "How to get citizenship?"
• "What day is today?"
• "Passport documents needed"
• "Business license fee"

What would you like to know?
{office_hours_response}

Contact Information:

For specific contact details, please tell me:
• Which service you need (e.g., "passport office contact")
• Which location/district
• What type of help you need

General Contact Points:
• District Administration Office: Your local DAO
• Ward Office: Your municipal ward office
• Department of Passport: Tripureshwor, Kathmandu

Better Help: Ask me something like:
• "Citizenship office contact in [district]"
• "Passport office phone number"
• "Ward office contact details"

मैं ई-BADAPATRA हूँ!

About Me:
• Your digital government services assistant
• Specialized in Nepal's government procedures
• Here to make bureaucracy easier for you!
• I speak both Nepali and English

My Mission:
• Simplify government service information
• Help you understand document requirements
• Provide office hours and location details
• Save your time and reduce confusion

Fun Fact: BADAPATRA means "big document" - representing all the important government documents I help you with!

Ready to help you navigate Nepal's government services with ease! What do you need today?

Language Support:

I understand:
• Nepali (नेपाली)
• English
• Mixed Nepali-English (Hinglish style)

You can ask me in any style:
• "Citizenship kaise banaye?"
• "How to get nagarikta?"
• "Passport ko lagi ke documents chahiye?"
• Pure English or pure Nepali

I'll respond clearly in the language that's most helpful for you!

What government service information do you need? Ask me in whichever language is comfortable!

I'm sorry you're facing issues!

Let me help you:

If it's about government services:
• Tell me which service (citizenship, passport, etc.)
• Which office you visited
• What specific problem you faced

If it's about me (the system):
• Try rephrasing your question
• Type "clear" to restart our chat
• Be more specific about what you need

For official complaints:
• Contact the grievance section of the relevant office
• File complaints through official government portals
• Visit the office with a written complaint

How can I better assist you right now?

Thank you so much!

Your appreciation means a lot! I'm glad I could help make government services easier to understand.

Remember:
• I'm always here when you need government service info
• Share me with friends and family who might need help
• Government services are your right - use them confidently!

Need anything else?
• More service information?
• Office hours for tomorrow?
• Help with a different document?

Jai Nepal! Always happy to serve!

I'd love to help clarify!

Please be more specific about:
• Which government service you're asking about
• What exactly you want to know
• Which part needs clarification

For example, ask me:
• "How to apply for citizenship certificate?"
• "What documents needed for passport?"
• "Where is the passport office located?"
• "When are government offices open?"
• "Why do I need these documents?"

The more specific your question, the better I can help you!

What would you like to know about?

Emergency/Urgent Services:

Tatkal/Express Options Available For:
• Passport (Rapid processing - higher fee)
• Some citizenship services
• Emergency travel documents

Important Notes:
• Express services cost more
• Not all services have urgent options
• Genuine emergency proof may be required

For Medical Emergencies:
• Call 102 (Ambulance)
• Visit nearest hospital

For Security Emergencies:
• Call 100 (Police)

For Urgent Government Services:
Specify which service you need urgently, and I'll tell you if express processing is available!

Online Government Services:

Available Online:
• Passport: Online application at passport.gov.np
• National ID: Status check at nidmc.gov.np
• Some certificates: Through local government portals
• Trekking permits: Online applications available

Mobile Apps:
• Government service apps being developed
• QR code scanning for some services

Important:
• You still need to visit offices for biometrics/verification
• Online payment options available for many services
• Keep digital copies of all documents

Specific Service: Tell me which service you want to apply for online, and I'll guide you to the right portal!

Today is {current_day}!

{office_hours_response}

What government service information do you need?

I'm doing great, thank you for asking!

I'm here and ready to help you with any government services you need information about!

Today's a good day to:
• Get your documents in order
• Learn about government services
• Check office hours with "what day is today?"
• Plan your visits to government offices

What brings you here today? Any government service you need help with? I'm excited to assist!

Complete Government Services List:

Identity & Citizenship:
• Citizenship Certificate (By descent/Naturalized)
• National ID Card Registration
• Citizenship corrections & replacements

Travel Documents:
• Regular & Rapid Passport services
• Visa services (Tourist/Business/Study)
• Travel permits & extensions

Civil Registration:
• Birth Certificate registration
• Death Certificate registration
• Marriage Certificate registration
• Late registration services

Business & Property:
• Business License registration
• Factory & Workshop permits
• Land registration & transfer
• Vehicle registration & licenses

Special Services:
• Trekking permits (All restricted areas)
• Labor & employment services
• Trade union registration

Ask me about any specific service for detailed information!

Government Service Fees:

Popular Service Fees:
• Citizenship Certificate: Usually free
• National ID Card: Free for first-time
• Regular Passport: Rs. 5,000 (32 pages)
• Rapid Passport: Rs. 12,000+
• Birth/Death Certificate: Usually free if registered on time
• Business License: Varies by business type

Important Notes:
• Fees may vary by district
• Late registration often has penalties
• Express services cost more
• Some services free for certain categories

For exact fees: Please ask about a specific service like "passport fee" or "business license cost"
